'''[[2015-2016 SB32 (USA CA)|SB 32]] California Global Warming Solutions Act of 2006: emissions limit.'''

Final legislative action 2016-08-24 passed yeas 25, nays 13. 
:*Jim voted yea (in favor of Do pass and be re-referred to the Committee on [Appropriations]).
:*Jim voted yea (in favor of Do pass as amended.).
:*Jim voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading Amend By WILLIAMS Set #1).
:*Jim voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading By RIDLEY-THOMAS).
:*Jim voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Motion to Reconsider).
:*Jim voted yea (in favor of Do pass as amended and be re-referred to the Committee on [Appropriations]).
:*Jim voted yea (in favor of Do pass.).
:*Jim voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading Amend By GARCIA, E. Set #1).
:*Jim voted yea (in favor of SB 32 Pavley Senate Third Reading By GARCIA, E.).
